def_cn: 一注三赢地（赛马或赛狗中一种赌博的方式，无论下注的马或狗在比赛中获得第一、第二或第三，有时甚至是第四，下注者都可赢钱）
def_en: If you bet money each way on the result of a horse race or a dog race, you will win some money if the animal you bet on comes first, second, third, or sometimes fourth.
If you say that something is a good each way bet, you mean that you think it is a good thing to support or invest in because it is unlikely to fail.
